column1: Topic title: 火箭又被藍眼打臉：希盟不廢除消費稅；到底要相信林冠英還是努鲁伊莎呢？

column3: text
火箭又被藍眼打臉：希盟不廢除消費稅；到底要相信林冠英還是努鲁伊莎呢？林冠英:若希盟執政續頒援助金取消消費稅南北大道過路費| 中國報 林冠英：希盟一旦執政廢除消費稅過路費| 中國報 林冠英：若希联执政将取消消费税大道收费| 光华日报 火箭黨魁林冠英連續三年說了廢除取消消費稅，結果當家不當權，在希盟裡被藍眼二當家努鲁伊莎當著全國人民前打臉。大家要信 火箭黨魁林冠英 呢，或是 藍眼二當家努鲁伊莎 ？
现在是Joseph Lim说得比较大声。。。。。不过如果希盟执政。。。。他就没有插话的份了。。。。。
希盟支持者、選民們要信誰？

那也是，你现在的身份是宋议员，不知道一灯的想法也算情有可原。那等迟点logout login 了再说吧。对了，宋议员都用什么繁体输入法的？
你好。    我是用microsoft window 的输入法。可在control panel ->Region and Languages ->Change keyboard加入各国语言输入。    简单点，Cari论坛有简繁字转换的功能。
那总要打字吧，宋议员是用拼音呢，还是香港人惯用的其他输入法？
你好。   我年级较老。拼音较适合我。常年北漂简体用较多。为什么你会猜我会是南方段皇爷？
是哦，香港人用拼音哦，真难得。年纪老香港人适合用拼音是从何说起呢？那宋议员会用仓颉吗？宋议员生意做好大哦，又北漂，又在“马来西亚参加各类比赛”，又马来西亚做生意
你好。    老人家用拼音较简单。何必花时间学仓颉？   为什么你会猜我是南方段皇爷？   中港台日韩的邀请赛我都会去的。
年纪老香港人用拼音是什么逻辑来的？繁体字比仓颉还难学啊，干嘛香港学校又教繁体字？
你好。     拼音比仓颉还容易。会拼音，简繁日韩德的输入，目前是没问题。港台用繁体，自有他的优缺点。
上世代的香港老人有宋议员那么好的汉语拼音的确很不容易。况且宋议员多才多艺，世界各国参加比赛，还拿奖，奖金还大到进入税收局的雷达，还在各地有会计师，还北漂南漂到处有office，还在cari教育晚辈 宋议员果然是人上人，人中龙凤。
你好。     我目前的生意是家族生意（父辈留下来的），经济自由才能各处参赛。人上人就不敢当，大马那些白手起家，能在她国开学校，赌场。瞬间拥有大量资产的人。那些才历害。    有位台湾朋友更高明，中港台马都有自己的温柔窝。

納吉當教育部長時，廢除了《1961年教育法令》第21（2）條文： 如果 0% GST = 廢除 GST，那麼 大家同意把 《1961年教育法令》第21（2）條文 留著，只要教育部長不執行，也就是沒有人隨時隨地把各源流學校包括華小改制為國民學校，就等於廢除了，對嗎？
0% gst = 不用交 gst 马华江夏仔，你说对不对 @cyberjaye @cyberjaye 来，我们可能又可以看马华江夏仔再次表演经典数学了。

正解來了。1. DAP Secretary-General YAB Lim Guan Eng had revealed that Pakatan Harapan had made a decision to reduce the GST rate from 6% to 0% as part of their campaign manifesto.2. He continues to insist that reducing GST to 0% is the same as abolishing GST.3. This is untrue as the government and businesses will continue to bear the unnecessary administrative expenses of GST-compliance but does not give benefits to any party. It will become a big negative with no positive benefits.4. This makes a mockery of YAB Lim's statement that it is more cost-effective to retain the tax, but at a zero rate.5. Malaysia will then make history as the first and only country in the world which has a GST system set at 0%. The world will laugh at us for having a tax system that will burden the government and businesses with administrative duties and expenses but has no tax revenue for the government.6. YAB Lim also says that even if they win Putrajaya, there are doubts that they have the power to abolish GST.7. This shows that Pakatan is insincere about abolishing GST and is implicitly acknowledging that implementing GST had always been the right decision by the BN Government.8. Pakatan frequently gives the impression that GST is an additional new tax that burdens the people but they do not acknowledge that with the introduction of GST, two taxes have been abolished, another two taxes have been reduced and BR1M had been substantially increased.9. The Sales Tax and Service Tax had been abolished. While the corporate income tax had been reduced to 24% from 26% in 2008.10. The personal income tax rate was also reduced to 24% from 28% in 2008. On top of this reduction, the tax bands have been expanded and various deductions have been allowed to the net effect that anyone earning RM4,000 per month and below do not pay any income tax.This also meant that the income tax payable by the middle-income group had also reduced.11. BR1M payments were also increased from RM650 in 2014 to RM1,200 for this year. Along with the effective income tax exemption for those whose income is RM4,000 per month or less, this means that the B40 income group is taxed at a negative rate by the government after the implementation of GST - meaning the B40 group is a net beneficiary of these tax reforms.12. Pakatan knows that the government has lost RM40 billion in Petroleum revenues in 2016 due to slump in global oil prices and had foregone another RM20 billion every year from abolishing sales and service taxes. The govt also has to bear the tens of billions foregone yearly from the reduction of corporate tax, reduction in personal income tax and increase in BR1M payments.13. With all the money foregone as part of the tax reforms and the fall in petroleum revenues, abolishing GST or reducing the GST rate to zero is unrealistic and will hurt Malaysia.14. Pakatan knows this - hence their reluctance to completely abolish GST.15. While the rest of the world is striving to become more competitive by modernizing their taxation systems through reducing corporate and personal income taxes and implementing consumption taxes such as GST, Pakatan wants to do the opposite to increase corporate taxes and dismantle GST.16. One wonders why Pakatan wants to move Malaysia backwards instead of forwards by making unrealistic and economically damaging promises?Barisan Nasional Strategic Communications Team,Putrajaya27 April 2017

马华江夏仔为什么不敢reply我哦？马华江夏仔用这种白痴的障眼法对别人可能有用，对我就没有用，一下子就被piak piak piak了。有内安法令，但修改未经审判就长时间囚人的条文，就没有人会被政府抓起来长时间无辜囚禁。修改了条文，政府就算想抓人，也没有法律基础可以抓，需要在国会修改法令后才可以抓。有消费税法，但修改税率到0%，就没有人需要交消费税给政府。修改了条文，政府就算想收gst，也没有法律基础可以收，需要在国会修改法令后才可以收。===========================如果1960内安法令取消或修改不经审判就抓人的共产时代条文，就算保留内安法令也不会有人无辜被长时间囚禁。内安法令还有很多其他关于军火，爆炸物，建筑物等条文可能还适合用。=====================同样的，保留 GST Act 2014，把税率调为 0%，就没有人需要交gst 0% gst = 废除 gst = 不用交 gst Fact
